articles.title: COVID-19 pandemic has caused ‘collective trauma’ among US adults, new poll says - Fox News
articles.description: Nearly four years after the start of the COVID-19 pandemic, the U.S. population is still experiencing “collective trauma," per a new survey from the American Psychological Association.
articles.content:
Nearly four years after the start of the COVID-19 pandemic
, the U.S. population is still experiencing "collective trauma," a new survey suggests.

articles.title: "USA Will Collapse Just Like The USSR", Claims Hamas's New Warning: Report - NDTV
articles.description: Amid the ongoing Israel-Hamas war, senior Hamas official, Ali Baraka warned that one day the United States of America will be a "thing of the past" and "collapse like USSR", the Jerusalem Post reported.
articles.content:
"All of America's enemies are consulting, getting closer," the Hamas official warned. (Representational)

articles.title: US spy planes search scour Gaza for Israeli, US and other hostages - USA TODAY
articles.description: The Pentagon says U.S. spy planes have been searching for hostages in Gaza, an acknowledgement of a deeper American military involvement.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON The Pentagon has been flying unarmed drones over Gaza in search of hostages, the Defense Department acknowledged on Friday.
